title: How to test your LLM prompts (with examples)
title1: How to test your LLM prompts (with examples)
title2: How to test your LLM prompts (with examples)
description: How do you measure the quality of your LLM prompts and outputs? In this blog, we talk about how you can evaluate LLM performance and effectively test your prompts.
author: Lina Lam
